answers.answer: How far along are you? Has your doctor offered steroid shots to help baby's lungs develop?
I'll be 30 weeks this thursday and no I'm a scheduled c section so he hasn't said anything I only gave 9 weeks left

I wouldn't worry until they put you on bed rest and give thr steroid injection for the lungs. That tends to mean they expect you to deliver in the next week. I went into preterm labour at 34wks due to preeclampsia and a tummy bug and they said it was ok to let it happen. Otherwise I'm sure the antibiotics for the uti will settle things down. Remember to stay hydrated.

question: I was told due to stress and a uti. I am in danger of having preterm labor and I was told I lost my mucus plug and I have been Having small contractions. Advice
title: preterm labor fear
